about_the_game:
"Weird RPG 2" is an ARPG game focusing on boss battles.

Unique equipment system
Voice-controlled equipment: Players can use voice commands to strengthen weapon attacks or cast magic. Voice control will greatly help you gain an advantage in battle.
Hardware equipment: Different hardware equipment will have completely different equipment characteristics. Choosing your own hardware equipment will bring a unique gaming experience.
Transformation equipment: You can transform into powerful monsters, gain unique abilities, and experience completely different fighting styles.

Smooth combat experience
The game has a smooth action system that does not rely on these powerful equipment, and the combat experience of the game itself is also very good.
You can use parry or dodge to avoid enemy attacks, and find the right moment to hit the enemy's vital points.
Whether the player is frozen or swaying after attacking, he can quickly adjust his combat status by sprinting or parrying.

This game is tailor-made for players who are looking for a novel gaming experience and love action combat. It is not just a game, but a new adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX 150 ( 2048 MB); Radeon R7 260X (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent; AMD FX-8350 (8 * 4700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 ( 2048 MB); Radeon RX 580 (8192 MB)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: The sequel to the "Weird RPG" game. An action role-playing game focusing on boss battles. Players can use a series of special methods such as voice control and equipment hardware to strengthen their characters to fight. This will be a very wonderful adventure.
